title: Morde's vgu skipped again in favor of naut

replies.body: Nautilus isn't getting a VGU? There's a NEW water support champion, not a Naut rework

>**we will be slightly ramping down the amount of new champions**
>Let’s reset a bit and wade right into the next champion we’re **adding to the list**.

Idk sounds like theyre talking about a VGU to me

maybe im wrong

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
On Reddit they literally confirmed it's a new champ not a Naut rework. But why do some research.

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=M0E63WBJ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-04-19T18:50:00.352+0000)
>
> Idk sounds like theyre talking about a VGU to me
> 
> maybe im wrong
> 
> {{sticker:sg-lulu}}

"Let’s reset a bit and wade right into the next champion we’re adding to the list. We felt it was time to execute on a new support with a darker, deeper thematic than most of our support cast."

They're referring to a NEW support. Not a rework. And if they were to tease a Nautilus rework they would list it at the bottom of the roadmap like all other new VGU teasers. Example: The Nunu teaser in the last one.
It's Nunu and that's fine. He actually needs it more. So I don't have a problem with it.
